ModMetaData.name: [1.4] Android Tiers Nandroids - local test
ModMetaData.author: Indonesian Gentleman
ModMetaData.description:
Add-on to Android Tiers, requires Android Tiers. Adds Nandroids!
Nandroids from the webcomic "Emmy the Robot" by Dominic Cellini.
Feature list:
-Nandroids! And how to make them -Several hairstyles seen on the webcomic and more from the fandom -A Nandroid maid apron! -Three artificial limbs, including the Sterling brand Jar Opener Augment! -Several backstories, mostly based on the Android Tiers backstories
